nodes.text: HR-02 Omni Droid was a droid model designed by Galactic Solutions Industries. It's purpose was to assist in holo-reconstructions, however their drawback was in increased power consumption. Such units were used by the GSI team working on the Emperor's Eye on Ziost during the Invasion of Ziost.
HR-02 Omni Droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during a Daily mission on Ziost.
